subject: Greetings  , this is Diaz cas
body:
Greetings  , this is Diaz cashier on seat forMotorcitygunshop.com We received your order with order number # . Below is our Registered Zelle info. Login into your Zelle account an use the Zelle info below to complete the payment for your order. 
Amount Due: $200
Zelle recipient email: 
XXXXX@gmail.com
Zelle recipient name: ITALIA DIAZ /Motor City 
Note: Make sure you double check our Zelle recipient email before making payment to avoid typo
Kindly send a screenshot confirmation receipt once you complete the transaction. Your tracking number will be sent to you once we confirm the payment within 24hours
Have a blessed day Thank you

subject: Re:  Greetings  , this is Diaz cas
body:
Hello there! I'm so glad to hear that my order has been received. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with Zelle. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about how it works? And also, could you please confirm the total amount for my order? I want to make sure everything is correct before proceeding. Thank you and have a blessed day too!

Best wishes,
Angelina
